title: Landrieu's Loss Flips Lingering Holdout Of Democrats' 'Solid South'
teaser: In her runoff against Republican Bill Cassidy, incumbent Sen. Mary Landrieu, D.-La., didn't just lose â€” she was walloped. The win gave the GOP complete dominance of the Deep South in the Senate.
